Title: They Get the Job Done . . . but They’re Annoying
Description:
Today, we’ll hear about: 

  • A caller deciding whether or not to hire a high performer who’s irritating 
  • A franchise owner worried about his employee's financial choices 
  • Dave Ramsey’s thoughts on how you are both the problem and the solution in your business  
  • A son looking for advice on how to negotiate his salary in the family business
